headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), big metrics, and navigation links.

body.usage: Paragraphs, table data, inputs, and labels.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, API keys, audit logs.

primary.description: Medical Blue - Trustworthy, professional. Use for primary actions, active states.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Use for backgrounds, secondary buttons.

accent.description: Emerald 500 - Use for financial inflows, success states, positive trends.

destructive.description: Red 500 - Use for outflows, errors, delete actions.

background.description: Pure white for cards/main areas, very light slate for app background.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
cards.header: flex items-center justify-between mb-4 border-b border-slate-100 pb-4

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-medium px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 px-3 py-2 rounded-lg

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-sky-500/20 focus:border-sky-500 transition-all rounded-md h-10 px-3

sidebar.style: bg-slate-900 text-white h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col border-r border-slate-800
sidebar.link: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-lg transition-all mx-2

general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Maintain a strict 'Medical Clean' aesthetic: lots of white space, subtle borders, no heavy gradients.
Use the defined 'Medical Blue' (#0284c7) as the primary brand color.
Ensure all financial numbers are monospaced or aligned right for readability.
Implement the sidebar navigation for desktop and a drawer for mobile.
Use 'recharts' for all charts (financial trends, patient stats).
Ensure high contrast for accessibility (WCAG AA).
dashboard_specific: The Admin Dashboard must look like a 'Control Room' but clean.
Use 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard widgets.
Inflows should be green/emerald, Outflows should be red/rose.
Include a currency toggle (MKD/EUR) visible in the header or dashboard top bar.
files_to_create: Create reusable components in /app/frontend/src/components/ui/ (Card, Button, Input, etc.) using the styles defined above.
Implement the pages defined in the problem statement.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
